titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Chromate(3-), bisY3-(hydroxy-kO)-4-YY2- (hydroxy-kO)-1-naphthalenyl?azo-kN1?-7-nitro-1-naphthalenesu fonato(3-)?-, trisodium.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/20/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Chromate(3-), bisY3-(hydroxy-kO)-4-YY2- (hydroxy-kO)-1-naphthalenyl?azo-kN1?-7-nitro-1-naphthalenesu fonato(3-)?-, trisodium.
